scripts.install-all-three: concurrently "npm run install-root" "npm run install-frontend" "npm run install-backend"
scripts.build:prod: npm run install-root && npm run install-frontend && npm run install-backend && npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.start: concurrently "node dev.js"  "npm run start-backend" "npm run start-frontend"
scripts.go: node ./prepForDeployment.js && git status && git add . && git add . && git status
